function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);

var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;

if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;

if (submitButton) {

onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,

offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

Product Description

World Wide Application Garden Tools Set

KOTTO 4 Pack Pruner Shears Garden Cutter Clippers, Stainless Steel Sharp Pruner Secateurs, Professional Bypass Pruning Hand Tools Scissors Kit

[High-Quality Materials] – One piece chrome plated 3Cr13 stainless steel blades for high-strength use, easy to cut branches even wide to 3/4′.
[Labor-Saving] – Slightly curved scissors are ergonomically designed, and the embedded shock-absorbing spring applies pressure to branches during trimming, will save more effort.
[Comfort Handle] – The handle part of the pruning shears made by high-purity PP+TPR plastic, especially the hand grip is very comfortable, but also has strong toughness and strength.
[Exquisite Workmanship] – The blade has been sanded so deter tarnish and rust, its all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears would also help adjust the blades angle.
[Gardening Helper] – Looking for long-lived pruning shear, fruits shear, flower cutter? Those pruning shears could satisfy need of planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, greenhouse pruning.

Package Include:
3 pruner shears and 1 scissor
1 pruner shear 1 folding saw and 1 scissor
2 pruner shears and 1 scissor
3 bonsai scissors
2 garden loppers and 1 pruner shear

Storage Case:
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓

Quality : The blades of our shears gardening tools are made of high quality stainless steel that gives good precision and makes it easy to cut through branches. The ergonomic handle design reduces stress on your wrist and fits for small or big hands to ensure maximum cutting comfort and no-slip grip.
Material : The blade of these garden hand tools has been sanded to deter tarnish and rust, it’s all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears for gardening would also help adjust the blades angle too.
Comfort : The handle part of the garden scissors/pruning shears/gardening shears/garden clippers is made of high-purity PP+TPR plastic, making the handgrip very comfortable but also tough and strong.
Gardening Helper : These grass shears/pruning scissors/garden pruners could satisfy the need for planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, and greenhouse pruning.
Customer service : If you have any questions or issues regarding our product, please do not hesitate to send the seller a message through Amazon and we will respond within 24 hours.
Add-ons: We offer a pair of free protection gloves to protect your hands when doing gardening work.






World Wide Application Garden Tools Set

It all began in the summer of 2013 when Matt took a stray kitten home and named her Lomo. Lomo brought Matt a really purr-fect life. Later, they got another partner, an adopted puppy. Matt ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Love Pets Love DELOMO

pet supplies

Delomo was named after two pets. It all began in the summer of 2013 when Matt took a stray kitten home and named her Lomo. Lomo brought Matt a really purr-fect life. Later, they got another partner, an adopted puppy. Matt called him Desko. From then on they three became inseparable friends. They played and napped together. “All pets deserve a safe & loving home”. With this faith in mind, Matt created DELOMO intending to help more fur babies.

What inspires us:

We feel bound to help homeless animals and bring them a better life. All pets deserve a safe & loving home without being abandoned or euthanized.

What we are doing:

Big change starts small. We regularly provide assistance to the American Association of Pet Shelters. We believe that love will make a difference.

Why we did this:

Because we CARE. We care for life and our communities. We’ve been dedicated to sending everlasting love to all our pets, employees, and new fur-baby parents just like you. That’s why we take our products seriously.

Pet Hair Remover

pet grooming gloves

pet grooming gloves

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.26 x 7.95 x 0.71 inches; 4.97 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ DLO-PairGloves-Green
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 24, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DELOMO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07XM62WLS

ENHANCED FIVE FINGER DESIGN: Our shedding glove allows you to gently clean sensitive hard-to-reach places, like face, tail or legs. Soft & longer silicone tips for grooming your pets better. No more worry about those short tips couldn’t reach your furry babies’ skin
EASIER TO CLEAN: The grooming glove has a special layer of coating on the silicon. The pet hair could easily peel off from glove. Time saving and a wonderful gift for pet owners. Machine washable hair removal glove keeps your house clean and tidy.
FITS MOST OF THE PEOPLE: This pet hair remover with premium mesh material and adjustable strap size. Adjustable wrist straps according to the width of your wrist. The fast dry mesh will not make your hands sweaty
WARM TIPS: Stroke your pet with this machine washable gloves back and forth for several times to collect more hair. Spray a bit of water on the surface of silicone before using for better effects








Pet Water Fountain
Large Surface Lint Roller
Dog Travel Bag
Pet Grooming Gloves a Pair
Pet Grooming Gloves 1PC
Pet Hair Remover
Color Name White White Grey Blue Blue White

Still chasing your pets to brush them? Cleaning regularly but hairball ends up everywhere? Love you pets but hate the loose hair?

Say goodye to pet hair mess in the house. Delomo offers a better hair glove for these issues. Making grooming your pets as easy as take a breath. Enjoy a happy time with your furry friends when they get a massage and you’re free from the mess of hair everywhere.

Read more

DELOMO NEW PET HAIR REMOVER GLOVES

Effective to Remove Hair

A special layer of coating on the silicon which makes it much easier to clean the residual hair. You can peel off the accumulated hair simply.

Collects More Pets Hair

Delomo pet grooming glove with higher silicon tips, you could collect more hair now. No more worry about those short tips couldn’t reach you fury babe’s skin.

Ergonomic 5 Fingers Design

This upgraded pet glove has enhanced 5 fingers design allows you to gently clean sensitive hard-to-reach places, like face, tail or legs.

Easier to Clean the Glove

The grooming glove is hand and machine washable. You could throw it into the wash machine in gentle cycle and get a clean glove in several minutes later.

Read more

4
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:36 UTC – Details)

Pet Hair Remover

pet grooming gloves

pet grooming gloves

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9 x 7.2 x 0.5 inches; 4.76 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ delomo002
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 24, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DELOMO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01N9KSITZ

Hair Remover: Perfect for long, short and curly haired dogs, cats, horses, and other pets, grooming the hair quickly, gently and effectively; The shedding hair sticks to the glove, making it easy to peel and throw hair away
Bath Brush: Bathe the pets with this glove, which will clean the pet hair easily and give your pets a gentle massage without hurting their skin; Five finger design allows you to groom hard-to-reach places like tail or face
Skin-friendly: Free from any materials which could cause skin damage; Soft rubber ensure gentle massage and grooming without painful removing of fur or scratching the skin; One size fits all, it has adjustable wrist strap for a comfortable fit
What You Get: 2 blue DELOMO pet gloves (1 left-hand and 1 right-hand; The left-hand glove is customized for left-hander)








Pet Water Fountain
Large Surface Lint Roller
Dog Travel Bag
Pet Grooming Gloves 1PC
Pet Grooming Gloves a Pair
Pet Hair Remover
Color Name White White Grey Blue Green White

Slip on the Delomo pet grooming glove and keep your pet’s coat looking clean and healthy while reducing the hair scattered about the house!

Keeping your dog’s or cat’s coat brushed regularly is important for their overall health, as well as yours – and the Delomo Pet Grooming and Deshedding Gloves make it easier and more efficient than ever before!

Read more

How to use the pet grooming Gloves?

Spray a bit of water on the rubber side.

Start grooming your pet in sweeping motions.

Peel off the collected fur on the gloves.

Clean the gloves by hand or washing machine

Read more

item.title: Kids Winter Warm Sports Gloves – Cold Weather Waterproof Children Mittens Age 4 12 Years Boys Girls Black
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description This children’s winter glove has attractive appearance, The surface adopts knitted and thickened cloth with leather logo, making the cap look trendy. The cold weather gloves are perfect for indoor and outdoor activities like hiking, skiing, cycling, camping, mountain climbing and shopping. The short plush lining makes the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $17.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:27:46 UTC – Details)

Product Description

This children’s winter glove has attractive appearance, The surface adopts knitted and thickened cloth with leather logo, making the cap look trendy.

The cold weather gloves are perfect for indoor and outdoor activities like hiking, skiing, cycling, camping, mountain climbing and shopping.

The short plush lining makes the kids running gloves feel soft and comfortable and preserves better heat and maximum warmth for you to against the chilly winter and cold wind.

Moreover, the logo is fixed on the side of the cap via dedicated sewing process. Delicate and smooth stitching thread without easily split sewing, making it more durable and ensuring maximum comfort

Size Chart：

S: total length 7.1”/18cm; palm width 3.1”/8cm; length of thumb 3.4”/8.7cm; suitable for kids aged 4-6 years oldM: total length 7.5”/19cm; palm width 3.3”/8.5cm; length of thumb 3.5”/9Cm; suitable for kids aged 6-8 years oldL: total length 7.7”/19.5cm; palm width 3.5”/9cm; length of thumb 3.6”/9.3cm; suitable for kids aged 8-10 years oldXL: total length 7.9”/20cm; palm width 3.7”/9.5cm; length of thumb 3.7”/9.5cm; suitable for kids aged 10-12 years old

Touchscreen Gloves for Boys Girls

The children’s warm gloves are equipped with touchscreen conductive fabrics on the thumb and index/middle finger, your kids will not take off the thermal gloves in cold weather to use mobile phones tablets or other electronic products

The upgraded touch screen conductive fabrics makes the touchscreen working experience is more sensitive, more durable

Anti-slip Kids Gloves

The non-slip silicone with smile pattern on the whole palm extends to the fingers for a stronger grip， reducing potential hazards due to skiddingWhen children are playing with electronic products such as mobile phones and tablets, they can better hold them in their hands to avoid damage caused by falling itemsWhen children are riding bicycles, climbing and other outdoor activities, they can grasp the handrails more favorably to avoid danger due to letting go

the characteristics of silver fox velvet Delicate texture Soft No pilling no fading

silver fox velvet has a soft and delicate hand, and the fabric has excellent elasticity, so the fabric can quickly recover after being pulled or deformed without leaving wrinkles.

Waterproof Children’s Gloves

The toddler sports gloves are made of composite fabric with spandex and mixed silver fox velvet, making our warm kids winter gloves lightweight and durable, as well as waterproof and windproof.

The short plush lining makes the kids running gloves feel soft and comfortable, and preserves better heat and maximum warmth for you to against the chilly winter and cold wind

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.2 x 3.74 x 1.73 inches; 1.76 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 19, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ AOTOW
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BB7MCC7Z

Imported
elastic closure
High-Quality Fabric Winter Gloves – The toddler sports gloves are made of composite fabric with spandex and mixed silver fox velvet, making our warm kids winter gloves lightweight and durable, as well as waterproof and windproof. The children can play happily in rain and snow with our full-finger gloves.
Anti-Slip Silicone Kids Gloves – The non-slip silicone with smile pattern on the whole palm extends to the fingers for a stronger grip， reducing potential hazards due to skidding.
Sensitive Touch Screen Gloves – The children gloves have a touch screen function at the thumb index finger and middle finger, allowing children to use electronic devices such as phones and tablets without taking off gloves to avoid frostbite hands in cold weather
Comfortable & Warm Children Gloves – The boys cycling gloves have thickened liners with silver fox velvet to keep the winter gloves more comfortable warmer & less bulky.
Ideal Gift for Kids – This winter glove is suitable for indoor and outdoor activities, such as using phones and tablets, hiking, running, cycling, etc. It’s a great gift for your kids.

This children’s winter glove has attractive appearance, The surface adopts knitted and thickened cloth with leather logo, making the cap look trendy.

The cold weather gloves are perfect for indoor and outdoor activities like hiking, skiing, cycling, camping, mountain climbing and shopping.

The short plush lining makes the kids running gloves feel soft and comfortable and preserves better heat and maximum warmth for you to against the chilly winter and cold wind.

Moreover, the logo is fixed on the side of the cap via dedicated sewing process. Delicate and smooth stitching thread without easily split sewing, making it more durable and ensuring maximum comfort

  • XL: total length 7.9”/20cm; palm width 3.7”/9.5cm; length of thumb 3.7”/9.5cm; suitable for kids aged 10-12 years old

With a pretty gift package, the flashlight gloves are the perfect gift ideas for men, women, dad, husband, boyfriend as birthday gifts, Valentine’s Day Gifts, Father’s Day Gifts, Christmas gifts, Stocking Stuffers.
One Size Fits Most, Stretchy for Large Hands – The fingerless flashlight gloves are made of stretchy fabric, and with lengthened straps they can fit most adult men’s or women’s fingers and wrist. The cool flashlight gloves are useful gadgets for handyman, car lovers, electricians, engineers, mechanics, plumbers, truck drivers, delivery men when work at dark spaces. The lighted gloves are also helpful for fishing, outdoor running, camping, hiking, dog walking in the early morning or at dusk.
Gifts Under $20/30 for Men/Women Who Have Everything – With bright lights at your fingertips, it’s like having an assistant holding a LED flashlight for you. The LED light gloves will come in handy for seeing at night when grilling/ BBQ, dog walks, night snow shoveling, working on/ under vehicles, and endless possibilities. All PARIGO products are backed by a hassle-free return policy. For any product issue, we offer 100% money-back and a 24-month worry-free after-sale service. LED Flashlight Gloves Provide A Third Helping Hand. The Perfect Solution for Those Dark Moments

Sometimes you may be working on something that requires you to use both hands and it’s already dark where you can’t hold a flashlight and still work.

It may be riding your bike, doing some tasks in the garage, outdoors, or inside your house.

Well, there you should not worry anymore because you can use PARIGO LED flashlight gloves which you just put on your hands,

illuminate for you and work comfortably.

WHY PARIGO LED FLASHLIGHT GLOVES?

  • Keep your hands-free to focus on your work
  • The upgrade LED light is more directed adequate for your task
  • The batteries are replaceable that the LED fishing gloves can be reused for a long time
  • Stretchable finger-less gloves. One size fits most.
  • Cool gadget gifts ideas for men & women

HOLIDAY GIFTS GUIDE. PERSONALITY GIFTS WRAP.

PARIGO LED Flashlight Gloves Are Cool Gifts for Men/ Women On Many Gift-giving Occasions:

Birthday Gifts for men, Christmas Gifts for dad, Stocking Stuffers for brothers, Anniversary Gifts for husband wife or couples,

Thanksgiving Day Gifts for friends, Father’s Day gifts for dad, Mother’s Day gifts for mom, Valentine’s Day Gifts for him, and more.

Who Will Be Happy To Receive These Unique Gifts?

Marvel Gifts for Male/ female. Novelty Birthday Gifts for men Women. Unusual Birthday Gifts for Husband from wife.

Father’s Day Gifts for Dad from Daughter or Son. Cool Gifts for New Dad/ Step Dad/ Father in Law. Geek Gifts for Boyfriend or guys.

Gifts for Grandpa / elderly from grand child. Gag Gifts for Teen young brothers. White elephant gifts for adults or teenagers, niece or nephew. Housewarming gifts for friends or coworkers. Practical birthday gift ideas for dad who wants nothing and hard to buy. Xmas Santa presents for men. Valentines day gifts for him husband. Awesome Easter gifts for young tween. Fishing gifts for men unique gadget. Truck driver gifts for men.

Emergency flashlight for delivery men. Boating gifts for men dad. Useful lighting gadget for women who like knitting or DIY.

For Indoor Outdoor Use

The PARIGO lighted gloves are convenient and handy finger-less gloves with 2 LED lights built on index and thumb fingers.

It is multi-functional and can be used for many activities during the night, such as reading in the bed or working on a computer without turning on the lights and disturbing the roommate, repairing car jeep motorcycle in the garage, dog walking, patrol, fishing, hunting, riding and many more.

Thus the hand light gloves are also cool gifts for outdoorsman, camper, biker, hiker who love outdoor activities in the early morning or at dusk including running, hiking, camping, hunting, fishing, cycling, and more.

WHAT WILL LED FLASHLIGHT GLOVES BRING TO US?

  • Ample light for outdoor activities like fishing, cycling
  • The lights on fingertips can free the hands when working or repairing
  • Provide a good view while we’re running
  • Offer adequate lights for us to focus on things

Soft and Stretchy – One Size Fits Most

The PARIGO LED lighted gloves are made of premium spandex material which is lightweight, soft, and stretchable. So it can fit most adults or teens’ fingers.

The elastic fastening strap helps secure the LED gloves around the wrist.

Fingerless Gloves – Comfortable and Handy

The fingerless gloves will not hinder the movements of your fingers even when you are doing fine art & crafts, knitting, sewing or repairing. So it’s a cool gadget for men and women who often need extra lights when working with their hands.

What You Will Receive

1. one pair of flashlight gloves

2. with preinstalled cell batteries (common CR2016)

3. and 4 extra batteries (2 for each glove)

4. a storage pouch

5. user manual

6. beautiful gift box

Product Description

GARDENING GLOVES WITH FIVE COLOR FOR CHOOSING

WHY CHOOSING OUR GARDENING GLOVES?

These fashion gardening gloves with floral design that be a great gift to your family people, flexible, comfortable and durable, it will help to protects your hands from scratches or blisters. These working gloves make you feel comfortable and working more convenient and enjoyable.

UNIQUE DESIGN

Breathable Material

Our gardening gloves has moisture wicking layers inside keep your hands sweat free, you can work easily and freely even in summer.

Stab Proof

Sturdy, high-quality material will protect you from stab wounds while working in the garden.

Elastic cuff

Elasticated cuffs for easy on and off, keep you from falling and feeling uncomfortable even if you wear it for a long time.

Touch Screen Design

Touch screen finger design allows you to take calls without removing gloves while working in the garden.

GARDENING
